title: Pre-game Chat and Updated Client not working
body:
I am unable to log into the new client on my computer, as I receive an "unable to connect to the login queue" message.  This is unique to my machine, as I can use the exact same account on other machines, and it works fine.  I am able to log into the legacy client, but my pre-game chat and friend invites do not work at all.  In game chat works fine.  I have tried shutting off all firewalls, and I've tried everything on the connection issues help page.

This issue began back in October, I think, right after my computer got a new Windows 10 update, so I blame it on Windows.  I've tried running in compatability mode to fix the problem, but it doesn't seem to help either.  Any suggestions that I haven't tried yet would be helpful.

replies.body: Yeah...that's another thing.  Whenever I try to use the tech support site, I enter my username and password, and then it gives me a screen that reads "signing you out."  I don't want to sign out.  I want to sign in!

Hmmmmm since you mentioned this started after a windows update, and that it's giving you the unable to connect error, my first response would be our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) but I see you've been through that already!

Since you've done a good deal of troubleshooting on your end already, let's get you some one on one help to see what might be going on. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to go much more in depth.
